reference.title: euca-bundle-vol
reference.shortdesc: Bundles an image for use with Eucalyptus or Amazon EC2, compressing, encrypting and signing a snapshot of the local machine's root file system.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: euca-bundle-vol [-s, --size size ][-u, --user user ] [-c, --cert cert_path ][-k, --privatekey private_key_path ] [-a, --all][-p, --prefix prefix ][--no-inherit] [-e, --exclude exclude ][--kernel kernel_id] [--ramdisk ramdisk_id][--product-codes product_codes] [-B, --block-device-mapping block_device_mapping] [-d, --destination destination_path] [--ec2cert ec2cert_path ] [-r, --arch target_architecture] [--volume volume_path ][--fstab fstab_path] [--generate-fstab][--batch][-a, --all][--inherit][--no-inherit] [--volume path][--fspath path][--generate-fstab] [--ec2cert file][--kernel image] [--ramdisk image][--progress][--no-progress]

section.title: Output
section.p: Eucalyptus returns status messages describing the stages and status of the bundling.
